europeana:record.dc:title: [Biostratigraphy and paleoecology of the Neogene micromammalian faunas from the Calatayud-Teruel Basin (Spain) / Freudenthal, M. (editor)]: Synopsis of the Dutch-Spanish collaboration program in the Aragonian type area, 1975-1986
Scripta Geologica. Special Issue
europeana:record.dc:creator: Daams R.
Freudenthal M.
europeana:record.dc:subject: Geologie: algemeen
europeana:record.dc:description: A review is given of more than 10 years of paleontological and stratigraphical work in the type area of the Aragonian. Methods and techniques are described, and an outline is given of the most important biostratigraphical and chronostratigraphical results.
europeana:record.dcterms:isPartOf: [Biostratigraphy and paleoecology of the Neogene micromammalian faunas from the Calatayud-Teruel Basin (Spain) / Freudenthal, M. (editor)]: Synopsis of the Dutch-Spanish collaboration program in the Aragonian type area, 1975-1986 (URN:ISSN:0922-4564) (Volume 1) (Issue 1)
